title: Disconnected from a game randomly
body:
I was in the middle of a game and then all of a sudden I get disconnected (500ms). I tried the usual disconnecting and reconnecting but instead of being able to reconnect, I was at the home page and was able to start a new game. I checked on op.gg and saw that my game was still undergoing.

-> Was in a Discord call, did not notice any internet problems outside of the LoL.
The game was not counted in any match history.


?

replies.body:
If the match never showed up in your match history, then this was probably caused by a hiccup with the gameserver your match was hosted on. This would explain why the game seems to have never existed after you disconnected.

If you have any questions, let me know.
